name: Replay Box
description:
A Game for the Brakey's Game Jam.

Each level you will move the box around and the game will capture your movement for 5 seconds, and when you controll the player, the game will repeat your movement with box. Your goal is to move the box in a way that will let you move the player to the end of the level (watch the video for better understanding).

Use WASD or arrows to controll the box in the beginning of each level

Use WAD or arrows to controll the player while the game repeats your box movement

Esc to pause and restart the level

Notes: Sorry for the leak of sounds and buttons. Ask me in the comments if you didn't understand the tutorial.
